sentences: Izabella Kuliffay (29 December 1863 – 19 January 1945) was a Hungarian pianist and composer.
She was born in Pest, and studied music at the National Conservatory in Budapest from 1877–79, and the Budapest Academy of Music from 1879–83, with teachers including Kornel Abranyi and Gyula Erkel.
After completing her studies, Kuliffay taught music in Budapest.
